definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: The chemistry of connate water can change in composition throughout the history of the rock.
sentences.chinese: 原生水的化學性質隨岩石的歷史而有成分上的變化。

sentences.english: The method was based to deoxidize the chemical characters.
sentences.chinese: 建立了還原徐家圍子斷陷深層地層水化學性質的方法。
它們的化學性質不活潑。

sentences.english: The last column are rare gas, stable chemical properties.
sentences.chinese: 最後一列上都是稀有氣體，化學性質穩定。

sentences.english: Chemical properties of stability, with a total reduction of carbon barium sulfide.
sentences.chinese: 化學性質穩定，與碳共熱還原爲硫化鋇。

sentences.english: In this paper, the properties of isospectral spectra are connected with some chemical properties and reactive activity of substances.
sentences.chinese: 將同譜性與物質的化學性質和反應活性相關聯。

sentences.english: Soil biological and biochemical variables are considered to be essential to measure changes in soil quality.
sentences.chinese: 土壤生物化學性質是重要的監測土壤變化的參數。

sentences.english: We do all of this to understand the chemistry of one molecule.
sentences.chinese: 我們做了所有這樣的事，以瞭解一個分子的化學性質。

sentences.english: Silver has its own physical and chemical properties as distinct from gold.
sentences.chinese: 與金不同，銀有自己的物理和化學性質。

sentences.english: Two chemical qualities make TiO2 an all-purpose cleaner.
sentences.chinese: 兩種化學性質使得二氧化鈦成爲通用的清潔劑。

sentences.english: It is also quite flexible, in that both the core and shell chemistries can be independently modified and optimized.
sentences.chinese: 它相當靈活，可獨立修改並且優化芯和殼的化學性質。

sentences.english: The chemical properties of the solid phosgene make it have very widespread use.
sentences.chinese: 由於固體光氣的化學性質，使其有着極廣泛的應用。

sentences.english: What are their chemical properties and reactivities in isolation?
sentences.chinese: 分離後它們的化學性質和反應如何？
